text: He imandarasakala! Tomaloke nijake arau tomalokara paraiyalabargaka jahannamara paraa raksa karaa, yara indhana ha’ba manuha arau sila, ya’ta niyojita ache nirmama, kathorasbabhara phiraistasakala, yisakale allahara adesa aman'ya nakarae; arau sihamte yi karaibalai adesa praapta haya se'itorae'i karae
